Title: Relates to requiring the installation of intelligent speed assistance devices for repeated violation of maximum speed limits
Summary: Requires the installation of intelligent speed assistance devices if a driver accumulates eleven or more points on their driving record during an eighteen month period, or receives 6 speed camera or red light camera tickets during a twelve month period.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the installation of intelligent speed assistance devices for repeated violation of maximum speed limits
